experience.title: Assistant Manager
duties: Interpreted and communicated new or revised policies to the staff and residents
Populated and updated Medical Administration Records (MAR) of residents
Created monthly schedules for staff and activity calendar for residents
Served as liaison for residents, family members, and staff
Investigated and reported incidents and family member or residents’ complaints to the facility owner
Resolved and satisfied residents’ requests or issues

experience.title: IT Consultant
duties: Built and maintained website from scratch for small business clients
Set up Zoho CRM to store customer information, to manage company email, and to create and send estimates/invoices
Built desktop PCs according to specific needs using custom parts
Maintained PCs by keeping it up-to-date via software updates and replacing damaged/outdated hardware

experience.title: Home Care Aide
duties: Monitored and reported important patient information to healthcare providers to help with treatment and care
Promoted good hygiene by assisting with bathing and brushing teeth
Sanitized high-touch surfaces and equipment daily or after each use
Kept accurate records of patient’s condition and progress
Transported clients for medical and recreational purposes

projects.name: Sherpa Home Improvement
projects.description: Website built for a home improvement small business based in Vienna, VA

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Displays current, hourly, and daily weather information of the selected city

projects.name: Trivia App
projects.description: Generates a trivia game according to the user-selected options (number of questions, category, difficulty)

projects.name: Todo List App
